page.title: 07LAW AND ORDER
page.content: 64% thought the crime rate was high in this area,and 36% said that they had experienced crime.The Police often do their rounds in a car.They sometimes ride on a motorbike or bicycle.Foot patrols are very common in the area.The Ilfracombe Police try to be a part of the community.They are not hated like in other areas.One of the local Policemen who is rather large is affectionately known as Larry the Lamb.This goes to show that Policemen in this area do not mind being called nicknames as long as they are not disrespectful.The Police in this area always pay a regular visit to schools.They also provide Police Trips for the Comprehensive School and Road Safety for the Junior School.
